body.name: Brightech Teardrop LED Floor Lamp – Tree Standing Lamp with 3 Elegant Cage Heads & Edison Bulbs – Standing Lamp for Living Rooms & Offices – Tall Standing Lamp Ideal for Bedroom Reading – Alpine White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 25 mins
features: Ultra-Bright LED Lighting: The Brightech Teardrop floor lamp features three 5 watt, 550 lumen LED bulbs. The power-saving bulbs have a life of 20,000 hours, so they will never need to be replaced. The tall lamp’s 2,700 warm white light is pleasant and warm on the LED color spectrum. Since the lights are LED, they will last much longer than less energy-efficient incandescent, halogen, and compact fluorescent (CFL) bulbs.

Modern Standing Lamp: This modern floor lamp is made to complement various living room décor styles, including contemporary, industrial, rustic, and farmhouse. The floor lamp has elegant lines, stunning color, and a trio of Thomas Edison-style bulbs inside gorgeous teardrop cages. The shades on the lamp have a reach of 9” and rest at 54”, 60”, and 66” inches on the poll. Each LED light drops 11 inches from the arms for an elegant look. The tall lamp's total height is 68”.

Energy-Saving and Long-Lasting Floor Lamp: The built-in LEDs in the standing lamp are made to last 20 years when used 3 hours a day. Unlike other modern bulbs, LED lights avoid wasting energy. More energy-efficient than CFL, incandescent, and halogen lights, the lamp can reduce electricity costs. Paired with a tall lamp, these built-in LED lights never need replacement. Save energy and money using Brightech lamps.

Matches Living Room Décor: The 3 lights on the Teardrop create a cozy soft light for a welcoming and warm feeling. The tall lamp is elegant and works exceptionally well as a corner lamp. The multi-head design on the floor lamp for living rooms avoids the harshness of traditional fixtures so you can relax and enjoy peace of mind. (Note: The included LED bulbs are not dimmable but can be replaced with smart bulbs for additional versatility.)

THE WARRANTY: Unlike other brands, our floor lamps are built to last, and we stand behind that. That's why Brightech USA offers an industry-leading 3-year warranty covering defects, malfunctions, or sudden failures to your standing lamp when purchased through us. Thanks to our friendly USA-based support team, you'll rest easy knowing your floor lamp has the backing you can trust.
body.description: Stylishly bring new life to your office, living room, or den while investing in cost-effective LED lighting equipment that provides useful warm light; the Teardrop from Brightech will help you save money on your power bill for years to come. With its sleek geometric lines, this advanced LED light source brings contemporary style to any room, even those with traditional living room décor. Blending upscale designs with sophisticated taste, the Teardrop floor lamp shines without stealing the show but still has enough charm to wow your guests!The glow from the ambient light of the floor lamp's bulbs casts an enlightened aura into any room's atmosphere. This easy light solution improves ambiance without upping the heat or issues associated with incandescent or halogen bulbs, making this free standing lamp ideal for any apartment, home, dorm room, or office. It fits a variety of styles from industrial to farmhouse and mid-century modern to contemporary. The lines of the cage drop shades add a decorative element that helps you show off your personal style in an unobtrusive classy way. Brightech was thinking about your convenience when including 3 LED bulbs with standard E26 socket bases with every purchase of the Teardrop. These bulbs feature 550 Lumens of 2,700 Kelvin color temperature illumination that lasts for over 20,000 hours before needing to be replaced!The sturdy weighted base and stand of the Teardrop are made of metal and finished with a sleek, slightly matte white that can be matched with almost any color or decorating scheme. A foot pedal on the tall lamp's cord provides an easy and convenient way to operate that standing lamp, and it can even be turned on and off via wall switches and is compatible with Alexa and other smart home devices, with the use of a smart plug. If you install smart bulbs, you'll have one of the most versatile lamps on the market!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really am so impressed with this floor lamp.I didn’t expect it to be so heavy. It is a snap to set up, and when you finish it is beautiful. As a matter of taste I think the bulbs that come with it are a little too bright but everything else is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple white floor lamp
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble. Works very well and gives off just the right amount of light. Good value for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and looks darling in my daughters room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EXTREMELY BRIGHT, but a nice sturdy lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a floor lamp which was a bit different and this one fit the bill! Packaging was great, a breeze to assemble, nice sturdy lamp, the Edison type bulbs looked great until I turned them on! The brightness was blinding! After ordering 3 different types of bulbs I finally found ones that work for us! 2w LED frosted candelabra bulbs. They are small and they don’t have the neat look of the Edison style bulbs but for us they work. Just remember if ordering this lamp, it doesn’t have shades which normally dim the glare of the bulbs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lamp. Exceeded my expectations.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this lamp after searching for a long time for something to brighten up my otherwise dark office. Was worried it was going to be too bright, and it is not. It is exactly what I was hoping for. Yes, it is bright. And, yes, shadows are cast from the cage. But the style and feel of the lamp are perfect for my space. The ceilings are low in this room, so it doesn’t feel too short. It was easy to assemble, took five minutes, it is sturdy and was well packaged with no nicks. I initially found this at Wayfair for nearly twice the price and am glad I had the presence of mind to search on Amazon. Very pleased with every aspect of this order and product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: This looks great with my farmhome decor. The bulbs that come with it are attractive but very bright - so I put 40 watt bulbs in to soften the light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lamp!
reviews.reviewText: Love this lamp! It’s made well and looks better than the pics.

Es como las fotos. Me parece una iluminación suficiente para una habitación amplia. En espacios reducidos puede resultar excesiva pero es luz cálida y siempre puedes optar por cambiar el tipo de foco. Algo bajita, la imaginaba más alta pero no me molesta.
Delivery was quick, easy to assemble and came with the light bulbs. Exactly what I ordered
Es bonita, tiene un estilo minimalista, sencilla pero resistente, incluye las bombillas, tiene un botón de encendido, no ocupa mucho espacio y creo que la altura es buena
Love everything about the lamp...was exactly as I pictured it!
